Class CourseManagementController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.CourseManagementController
public class CourseManagementController extends Object
Controller class for managing the course functionality. This class handles the UI and operations for managing courses. It includes methods for navigating to different sections and performing various tasks.
